channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Gear News of the Week: Samsung’s TriFold Sells Out in Minutes, and a Leak Teases Google’s New OS
item.description: Plus: Vivaldi browser shuns AI, Samsung has a new sustainable display, and Frankfurt Airport tests Auracast for gate announcements.

item.title: 'Extraordinary' Under Salt Marsh episode 2 scene 'wasn't scripted' reveals one star — and I dare you to not be moved
item.description: The first two episodes of Under Salt Marsh are now on Sky TV — and if one touching moment made you emotional, it's cast didn't even script it.

item.title: Test du Epson EF-72 : un vidéoprojecteur Ultra HD LED compact, design et avec un son Bose
item.description: L’Epson EF-72 est un vidéoprojecteur compact monté sur un pied orientable misant sur le design, la simplicité via Google TV et le son Bose. Voici un test complet pour savoir s’il peut vraiment devenir votre écran principal.

item.title: Amazon propose la meilleure offre pour s’offrir une Apple Watch Ultra : 360 € seulement
item.description: Il faut parfois passer par le reconditionné pour obtenir un produit Apple à un prix abordable. C'est le cas de l'Apple Watch Ultra 1 qui est affichée à seulement 360 euros sur Amazon : c'est le bon plan parfait pour celles et ceux qui veulent le nec plus ultra d’Apple sans se ruiner.

item.title: How to Film ICE
item.description: Filming federal agents in public is legal, but avoiding a dangerous—even deadly—confrontation isn’t guaranteed. Here’s how to record ICE and CBP agents as safely as possible and have an impact.

item.title: ICYMI: the week's 7 biggest tech news stories from Samsung teasing a major S26 upgrade to Garmin's leaked Whoop clone
item.description: Here are the biggest tech news stories from Whoop, Netflix, Samsung, OpenAI, and more for January 31, 2026.

item.title: This smart service saves memorable podcast moments in your inbox
item.description: Once you see how helpful this podcast-playing companion can be, you’ll never want to listen to audio without it. Listen, I don’t know about you, but I’m generally not so big on listening. I tend to be more of a “words in front of my eyes” kind of guy when it comes to taking in information (which, as I’ve come to learn, also means I’m “an old person” by modern-day standards—hey, I’m okay with that)....

item.title: TikTok’s odd behavior was caused by a tech issue—but users’ response indicates the app has a trust problem
item.description: Simple, if embarrassing, infrastructure issues can snowball into conspiracies about how Donald Trump is trying to tame the app. Welcome to the new world of TikTok. Anyone wanting to get their TikTok fix in the United States recently had a rough time. The app went haywire, kicking off early on the morning of January 25, due to a power outage at a key data center that knocked out services nationwide. Users reported the app crashing, with videos getting stuck and refusing to play, upload, or even hit a single view....

item.title: The 10 best portable Bluetooth speakers take your music to-go
item.description: Check out our favorite Bluetooth speakers, with portable options like the JBL Go 4, Marshall Emberton III, and Ultimate Ears Wonderboom 4.

item.title: Review: Grindr, youre a mess in 2026, so why cant I quit you?
item.description: With Grindr, you have to choose between too many ads and too high subscription fees. Is the gay hookup app still worth it in 2026?

item.title: Everything Vic Michaelis revealed about Very Important People
item.description: Dropout star and "Ponies" scene-stealer Vic Michaelis talks improv, surprises, and that iconic suit.

item.title: Artemis 2 wet dress rehearsal livestream: Watch the rocket test live
item.description: Here's how to watch NASA's wet dress rehearsal, a pivotal fueling test of the Space Launch System, before the launch of Artemis 2.

item.title: I guessed the Govee Permanent Outdoor Lights Prism would be cool, but not this cool
item.description: The Govee Permanent Outdoor Lights Prism are some of the best lights available for holidays, birthday parties, graduation, retirement, backyard barbecues.

item.title: How to watch Arizona State vs. Arizona online for free
item.description: How to watch college basketball for free. Live stream Arizona State vs. Arizona in 2025.

item.title: There are only a few hours left to save on this all-in-one AI tool
item.description: This tool unites the major AI models in one convenient spot, and now you can get a 1min.AI Advanced Business Plan lifetime subscription for only $74.97 through tonight at 11:59 p.m. PT.

item.title: Your global conversations start with Babbel Language Learning
item.description: Build real-world language skills for travel, work, and everyday life with Babbel’s expert-led lifetime learning while it's just $159 with code LEARN.

item.title: Sony Bravia Theater Bar 6 review: Big sound, zero hassle
item.description: Mashable's review of the Sony Bravia Theater Bar 6. Dolby Atmos and DTS:X system with an impressive 3.1.2 channels focuses on simplicity.

item.title: The 27 best comedies streaming on Netflix right now
item.description: Do you need a laugh right about now? Here are the the best comedies on Netflix, including "KPop Demon Hunters," "The Thursday Murder Club," and more.

item.title: The best action movies on Netflix right now
item.description: The best, most exciting action movies on Netflix, including "KPop Demon Hunters," "The Harder They Fall," "Damsel," "Kraven the Hunter," and more.

item.title: Volkswagen ID. Polo : de la version à 25 000 € à la puissance de la GTI, tout ce que l’on sait sur la gamme 2026
item.description: Volkswagen vient de mettre en ligne la liste des finitions de l'ID. Polo électrique, ainsi que son prix officiel de départ : moins de 25 000 euros. De la version Trend à la version GTi, voici tous les détails techniques connus actuellement.
